attributes.action: punish the parents/ carers of children who are neglegted by the afformentioned
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are many cases of children being neglected/ignored by their own parents/carers/guardians. the recent news will show you this. we need to STOP THIS NOW as these poor kiddies will end up as the 'benefit culture' we are becoming accustomed to and become the 'lost generation'. if the government cannot see this 'personally', then all to their own, but we cannot send our kids to public school etc so where are we left when Gordon Brown spouts all his rubbish?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
